name: voice-whisper-bot
description: Voice Whisper Bot with Telegram, Backend and Frontend

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "BOT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "green,yellow,cyan" "cd telegram-bot && node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=../.env.dev" "cd web/backend && PORT=3001 npm run start:dev" "cd web/frontend && VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3001/api npm run dev"
scripts.prod:build: cd web/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3002/api npm run build
scripts.prod:all: npm run prod:build && concurrently -n "BOT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "red,magenta,blue" "cd telegram-bot && node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=../.env.prod" "cd web/backend && PORT=3002 npm run start:prod" "cd web/frontend && npm run preview"
scripts.deploy: npm run db:migrate && npm run prod:build
scripts.db:migrate: cd web/backend && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5433/voice_notes_db?schema=public' npx prisma db pull && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5434/voice_notes_db_prod?schema=public' npx prisma db push
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd telegram-bot && npm install && cd ../web/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:dev:init: cd web/backend && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5433/voice_notes_db?schema=public' npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:prod:init: cd web/backend && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5434/voice_notes_db_prod?schema=public' npx prisma migrate deploy
